messages.title: Labour's Brexit let-down
messages.content: Voted with UKIP to back Brexit. Want us out of the single market. Fighting against free movement. Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More people in Cambridge are switching to the Lib Dems to stop Brexit wrecking Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives can't win here. Vote Lib Dem on 8th June.

issues.brexitEurope: More people in Cambridge are switching to the Lib Dems to stop Brexit wrecking Britain.

endorsements.endorsement: Lib Dems are the anti-Brexit party.
Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit.

quotes.text: Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition.

images.caption: More and more people in Cambridge are switching to the Lib Dems to stop Brexit wrecking Britain.
Lib Dems are the anti-Brexit party.
Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit.
